trendingResults.heading: Gordon Moore, Intel co-founder and creator of Moore's Law, dies aged 94
trendingResults.description: Mr Moore started working on semiconductors in the 1950s and co-founded the Intel Corporation.

trendingResults.heading: Top Gear's chequered past: Crashes, controversy and Clarkson
trendingResults.description: The popular motoring show has run for 240 episodes over 33 series.

trendingResults.heading: Ebola-like Marburg virus kills five people in Tanzania
trendingResults.description: High fever is a common symptom of the deadly Ebola-like virus.
